#define CVD_RS_INIT_A(indexRef)   MTOUCH_LAT_C_SENSOR(indexRef) |= (uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef))
#define CVD_RS_INIT_B(indexRef)   MTOUCH_LAT_C_SENSOR(indexRef) &= ~ (uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(indexRef))
#define CVD_RS_MUXSELECT(index, indexRef)

#define CVD_RS_EXIT_B(index)
#define CVD_RS_MUTUAL_A(index)

Detailed Description

Internal framework header file that defines the macros used to generate the CVD acquisition method for the PIC18F devices.

Note:
These macros should not be edited in most cases. If you do edit them, it could negatively impact the noise robustness of the final system.

Definition in file mTouchCVD_macroLibrary_PIC18F.h.

Define Documentation

#define CHECK_AND_CLEAR_TMRxIF (  )
Value:
do {                                    \
    if (MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF == 0)         \
    {                                   \
        asm("ljmp END_MTOUCH_SCAN");    \
    } else {                            \
        MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF = 0;          \
    }                                   \
} while (0)

Definition at line 138 of file mTouchCVD_macroLibrary_PIC18F.h.

#define CVD_RS_CONNECT_A (   index )
Value:
ADCON0bits.ADON = 0;                                                            /*  Stop sampling to avoid completion   */  \
                                                ADCON0bits.ADON = 1;                                                            /*  Start again to finish charging      */  \
                                                MTOUCH_TRIS_C_SENSOR(index)   |=  ((uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)));   /*  Set sensor to input                 */  \
                                                ADCON0 = MTOUCH_SELECT_SENSOR(index);

#define CVD_RS_EXIT_A (   index )
Value:
MTOUCH_LAT_C_SENSOR(index)    |=  ((uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)));   /*  Set sensor LAT high                 */  \
                                                MTOUCH_TRIS_C_SENSOR(index)   &= ~((uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)));

Definition at line 168 of file mTouchCVD_macroLibrary_PIC18F.h.

#define CVD_RS_EXIT_B (   index )
Value:
MTOUCH_LAT_C_SENSOR(index)    &= ~((uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)));   /*  Set sensor LAT low                  */  \
                                                MTOUCH_TRIS_C_SENSOR(index)   &= ~((uint8_t)(1 << MTOUCH_PIN_SENSOR(index)));

#define RESTORE_STATE (  )
Value:
do {                                    \
            _asm    movff  int_bsr, BSR         \
                    movf   int_w, WREG          \
                    movff  int_status, STATUS   \
            _endasm                             \
        } while (0)

Definition at line 98 of file mTouchCVD_macroLibrary_PIC18F.h.

#define SAVE_STATE (  )
Value:
do {                                    \
            _asm    movwf  int_w                \
                    movff  STATUS, int_status   \
                    movff  BSR, int_bsr         \
            _endasm                             \
        } while (0)
